glsa.title: a2ps: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in a2ps' fixps script might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: a2ps is an Any to PostScript filter.

description.p: a2psâ€™ fixps script does not invoke gs with the -dSAFER option.

impact.p: Remote attackers, by enticing a user to process a specially crafted PostScript file, could delete arbitrary files or execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All a2ps users should upgrade to the latest version:
